iterationSummary.iteration:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a specific iteration number
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, top left
**When Users See This**: When viewing any iteration summary card
**Technical Context**: `idx` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Iteration %{idx}"
iterationSummary.latest:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the iteration is the most recent
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, next to iteration number
**When Users See This**: When the displayed iteration is the latest one
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Latest"
iterationSummary.published:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the iteration has been published
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, next to iteration number
**When Users See This**: When the displayed iteration has been published
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Published"
iterationSummary.submitted:
**Functional Purpose**: Prefix for submission details
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, below the iteration number
**When Users See This**: When viewing submission details for an iteration
**Technical Context**: Appears before the submission method (CLI/Editor)
**Current English**: "Submitted "
iterationSummary.viaCli:
**Functional Purpose**: Describes the submission method as CLI
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, below the iteration number
**When Users See This**: When an iteration was submitted via CLI
**Technical Context**: Part of a dynamic string based on `iteration.submissionMethod`
**Current English**: "via CLI"
iterationSummary.viaEditor:
**Functional Purpose**: Describes the submission method as Editor
**UI Location**: Iteration summary card, below the iteration number
**When Users See This**: When an iteration was submitted via Editor
**Technical Context**: Part of a dynamic string based on `iteration.submissionMethod`
**Current English**: "via Editor"
